name: Real Yield NFT #306 (MVA)
description:
Real Yield MVA NFT: The first TON collection featuring Metaverse Asset to Real World Asset transformation. Premium Turkish property tokenization through Rent Tycoon game metaverse. Earn 6% APY in TON from rental income + airdrops starting Q1 2025.

Each NFT is connected to virtual MVA twin of the tokenized real estate object. Limited supply: 2000 NFTs.

Public Github Pages metadata repository ensures transparent MVA-RWA transition. Join the future of asset tokenization!

attributes.value: Turkey, Mersin, Deniz, Acıgöl Cd. No:71
